hst__aseta_kortti: Place the card in the reader.
hst__epaonnistui: Identification using certificate card was interrupted
hst__kortinlukijaohjelmisto: Digital and Population Data Services Agency website.
hst__laitteen_toiminta: Make sure that the reader device functions properly.
hst__odota_hetki: Wait until the information on the card has been read.
hst__ohjelmisto_avautuu: The card reader software will start. The card reader software will be used to make the actual identification. Leave the card in the reader throughout the identification.
hst__oikein_pain: Make sure the card is inserted correctly and right side up in the reader.
hst__palautelinkki: Please use the form provided to send us feedback.
hst__palautepyynto: If the problem persists, please send us feedback so that we can investigate and fix a possible recurring fault.
hst__peruuta: Go back to method of identification
hst__sisainen_virhe: An error occurred during the identification process, and your identification was interrupted. However, your information is secure, and other people cannot access it by mistake.
hst__sulkulistalla: Certificate is on the revocation list
hst__tarkista: Make sure the card reader software is installed in your computer.
hst__tarkista_tyyppi: Make sure the card contains citizen certificate.
hst__tunnistaudu_varmennekortilla: Identify yourself with a personal ID card
hst__tunnistautuminen_mahdollista: You can identify yourself using an electronic ID card, organisation card, or ID card for regulated healthcare professionals, non-regulated healthcare workers or non-clinical healthcare sector staff.
hst__tunnistautuminen_mahdollista_lyhyt: You can identify yourself using an electronic ID card, organisation card, or ID card for regulated healthcare professionals, non-regulated healthcare workers or non-clinical healthcare sector staff. In addition to the certificate card, you will need a card reader and the card reader software.
hst__vanhentunut: Make sure that the card is still valid.
hst__voit_testata: You can test the functionality of the card by using the Digital and Population Data Services Agency
hst__varmennekortin_lisaksi: In addition to the certificate card, you will need a card reader and the card reader software. The card reader software can be downloaded for free from the
